Text.Page:
I just read a disturbing report about {@LinkCreature:23#18#vampir} and {@LinkCreature:23#24$$popori insurgents} aiding the rebels.

The vampir aristocrats have never taken sides in kingdom politics. This is a bad sign, and one we must crush.

Eliminate the insurgents near Spirit Outpost. Hopefully, the other vampirs will get the message.

I always liked the vampirs, but we must make a statement.

Dirty business, that. You did well. Thanks.
